author: Bobby Nathan
message:
Add bookmarklet and API endpoint

- BookmarkletLive at GET /bookmarklet with draggable bookmarklet
- POST /api/links endpoint for bookmarklet submissions
- LinkController handles create with validation
- JavaScript bookmarklet sends URL/title via fetch

author: Bobby Nathan
message:
Add stumble LiveView UI

- StumbleLive at GET / with Stumble! button
- Shows random link with author info, avatar, follower count
- Tracks session history to avoid showing same links
- Displays total link count and top domains
- Gradient purple/pink design with Tailwind CSS

author: Bobby Nathan
message:
Add link extraction and scoring

- Extractor subscribes to firehose posts via PubSub
- Filters links by author quality (>=100 followers)
- Excludes replies and Bluesky internal links
- Log-based scoring algorithm (log10(followers) * 20)
- Links context with random_link/1 for stumbling

author: Bobby Nathan
message:
Add links database schema

- Link Ecto schema with url, url_hash, domain, title, score
- Author metadata fields (handle, display_name, followers_count)
- Stumble count tracking
- Migration with indexes on url_hash, domain, score

author: Bobby Nathan
message:
Add Bluesky firehose integration via Graze Turbostream

- WebSocket client connecting to Turbostream (hydrated firehose)
- Parser for Turbostream events with snake_case keys
- Type definitions for Post, Author, ExternalEmbed, FacetLink
- Supervisor for firehose process
- Broadcasts posts via Phoenix PubSub
